original_text: I want to go to places where nobody has ever told people about Christ before. I want to tell the good news to people in those places. That is what I have always wanted to do. I do not want to work in a place where someone else has already started to teach God's message. I want to go to places where nobody has ever told people about Christ before. I want to tell the good news to people in those places. That is what I have always wanted to do. I do not want to work in a place where someone else has already started to teach God's message. I want to go to places where nobody has ever told people about Christ before. I want to tell the good news to people in those places. That is what I have always wanted to do. I do not want to work in a place where someone else has already started to teach God's message.
korean_text: 또 내가 그리스도의 이름을 부르는 곳에는 복음을 전하지 않기를 힘썼노니 이는 남의 터 위에 건축하지 아니하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I want to go to places
where nobody has ever told people about Christ before
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그전에 그리스도에 대해 사람들에게 말한 적 없는 곳

sentences.original_text: I want to tell the good news
That is what I have always wanted to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 항상 하고 싶었던 일이에요

sentences.original_text: I do not want to work in a place
where someone else has already started to teach God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 누군가가 이미 하나님의 메시지를 가르치기 시작한 곳
